comment:
* Time-relate capabilities for a user. * *

For configuration settings capabilities, the associated settings value can be found via * {@link TimeManager#getTimeCapabilitiesAndConfig()} and may be changed using {@link * TimeManager#updateTimeConfiguration(TimeConfiguration)} (if the user's capabilities * allow). * * @hide

variables.name: mUserHandle
variables.comment:
* The user the capabilities are for. This is used for object equality and debugging but there
     * is no accessor.

methods.name: private static TimeCapabilities createFromParcel(@NonNull Parcel in)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public int getConfigureAutoDetectionEnabledCapability()
methods.comment:
* Returns the capability state associated with the user's ability to modify the automatic time
     * detection setting. The setting can be updated via {@link
     * TimeManager#updateTimeConfiguration(TimeConfiguration)}.

methods.name: public int getSetManualTimeCapability()
methods.comment:
* Returns the capability state associated with the user's ability to manually set time on a
     * device. The setting can be updated via {@link
     * TimeManager#updateTimeConfiguration(TimeConfiguration)}.

methods.name: public TimeConfiguration tryApplyConfigChanges(@NonNull TimeConfiguration config, @NonNull TimeConfiguration requestedChanges)
methods.comment:
* Tries to create a new {@link TimeConfiguration} from the {@code config} and the set of
     * {@code requestedChanges}, if {@code this} capabilities allow. The new configuration is
     * returned. If the capabilities do not permit one or more of the requested changes then {@code
     * null} is returned.
     *
     * @hide

methodNames: private static TimeCapabilities createFromParcel(@NonNull Parcel in)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public TimeConfiguration tryApplyConfigChanges(@NonNull TimeConfiguration config, @NonNull TimeConfiguration requestedChanges)
